20110111144319.000|20110111144319.000|CC1|   so I wasn't playing much of

20110111144324.000|20110111144324.000|CC1|        So now, I've got        
20110111144324.000|20110111144329.000|CC1|        the leading part.       
20110111144329.000|20110111144330.000|CC1|   ADVAIR is clinically proven  
20110111144330.000|20110111144330.000|CC1|  to help significantly improve 
20110111144330.000|20110111144333.000|CC1|         lung function.         
20110111144333.000|20110111144335.000|CC1|  Unlike most COPD medications, 
20110111144335.000|20110111144335.000|CC1|         ADVAIR contains        
20110111144335.000|20110111144338.000|CC1|    both an anti-inflammatory   
20110111144338.000|20110111144338.000|CC1|        and a long-acting       
20110111144338.000|20110111144339.000|CC1|         bronchodilator,        
20110111144339.000|20110111144341.000|CC1|        working together        
20110111144341.000|20110111144341.000|CC1|         to help improve        
20110111144341.000|20110111144343.000|CC1|   your lung function all day.  
20110111144343.000|20110111144343.000|CC1|      ADVAIR won't replace      
20110111144343.000|20110111144345.000|CC1|      fast-acting inhalers      
20110111144345.000|20110111144347.000|CC1|       for sudden symptoms      
20110111144347.000|20110111144347.000|CC1|     and should not be used     
20110111144347.000|20110111144349.000|CC1|     more than twice a day.     
20110111144349.000|20110111144349.000|CC1|        People with COPD        
20110111144349.000|20110111144351.000|CC1|          taking ADVAIR         
20110111144351.000|20110111144351.000|CC1|        may have a higher       
20110111144351.000|20110111144353.000|CC1|      chance of pneumonia.      
20110111144353.000|20110111144353.000|CC1|    ADVAIR may increase your    
20110111144353.000|20110111144356.000|CC1|      risk of osteoporosis      
20110111144356.000|20110111144357.000|CC1|     and some eye problems.     
20110111144357.000|20110111144357.000|CC1|  Tell your doctor if you have  
20110111144357.000|20110111144400.000|CC1|        a heart condition       
20110111144400.000|20110111144400.000|CC1|     or high blood pressure     
20110111144400.000|20110111144403.000|CC1|      before taking ADVAIR.     
20110111144403.000|20110111144403.000|CC1|     If you're still having     
20110111144403.000|20110111144404.000|CC1|      difficulty breathing,     
20110111144404.000|20110111144406.000|CC1|         take the lead.         
20110111144406.000|20110111144406.000|CC1|       Ask your doctor if       
20110111144406.000|20110111144408.000|CC1|        including ADVAIR        
20110111144408.000|20110111144408.000|CC1|       could help improve       
20110111144408.000|20110111144409.000|CC1|       your lung function.
